about_the_game:
A Cowboy Bebop-inspired space western visual novel adventure where you can define your path as bounty hunter Lucia Lopez in the far flung future of the Milky Way Galaxy!

Experience your life as Lucia Lopez - a charismatic ex-soldier turned bounty hunter faced with adversity, tracking down space bounties with hopes of finding the long-awaited answer to a shocking curse plaguing your life.

Aboard your ship, the Athena, is Zap Matters, your fun-loving, half-human, half-alien, partner-in-crime (and love), and Hobbes, your team's resident tech expert and a robotic talking cat.

It's up to you and your team to journey into a city at the fringes of the Milky Way and track down the last three bounties standing in your way of finding the answers Lucia has been seeking all her life.



  • Become the bounty hunter you want to be



    From always knowing the odds to sharing a love of dance or nerdy space operas with your crew, each background will affect choices you can make throughout the story of Bitter Silver as well as affecting the relationships between you and your crew. You'll even see parts of the story only available to each individual backstory!

  • Each playthrough only shows you part of the game!



    Actions, both big and small, will affect Lucia's story along the way. Who knows how they'll pay off in the end?

  • Enjoy slice-of-life moments between you & your misfit crew!



    Hang out with your crew outside bounty missions to get know them more while strengthening your bond. Do you indulge their behavior? Push against it? Or stand back and let them do their thing?

  • Take down unique bounty targets, dead or alive, using your skills as a team



    Experience the thrill of taking in bounty targets dead or alive as the leader of a trio of misfits in interactive, comic book-style sequences and be rewarded for your choices with unique ways to utilize your team's skills.

  • Treat your ears to a bebop-filled score



    Enjoy listening to an original score full of jazz, blues, and folk-inspired music to really get you in the spirit of down-on-your-luck bounty hunters.

Play the DEMO today!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult language, depictions of stylized violence, depictions of alcohol use, descriptions of PTSD, death, trauma, bodily injury, touching, sexual touching, and deals with mature themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: If you don't think your computer can run a visual novel... see you space cowboy...
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce (VRAM 1GB or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: You're gonna carry that (processing) weight...

short_description: A choose-your-own-adventure, space western visual novel. Play as a bounty hunter leading a team of bickering misfits as you track down targets with your words or your weapons in a reactive story where your choices matter.
